Migrating from P4 to validated TEI P5.

div.p: OLD ROUND TOWER, FORT SNELLING, MINN.

The Ft. Snelling reservation comprises about 2,000 acres, and is located midway between Minneapolis and St. Paul. It was established at a military post by the U. S. government in 1819 and maintains the largest garrison in the northwest.
I have traveled through a good many states this summer as well as Canada. I hope you too are enjoying the vacation.
